reviewText: A concise but superficial means of learning what "data science" is and what other folks are doing in it.  However, it is a bit of the "gee wizz" and "hey, wow" breezy style that doesn't give me confidence in the content.  It probably makes a good stepping stone to more specific resources, or may be all the detail you want or need.  It's subtitle is accurate: "A Simple Introduction to Data Science".
title: A Simple Introduction to DATA SCIENCE
